<div class="wp-block-uagb-container our-story-zipwp uag-blocks-common-selector uagb-block-d0f713f4 alignfull uagb-is-root-container">
<div class="wp-block-uagb-container uagb-block-bf285cb7">
<div class="wp-block-uagb-container uag-blocks-common-selector uagb-block-55fd0699">
<div class="wp-block-uagb-container uag-blocks-common-selector uagb-block-92ee4d90">
<div class="wp-block-uagb-advanced-heading uagb-block-a018d701"><h2 class="uagb-heading-text">Our Story</h2></div>



<div class="wp-block-uagb-container uag-blocks-common-selector uagb-block-7f56454c">
<div class="wp-block-uagb-container uag-blocks-common-selector uagb-block-c2d3694b">
<p>Hey everyone —</p>



<p>I’m Sujay and I want to introduce you to something I believe is going to change web design forever: ZipWP  – AI Website Builder 😃</p>



<p>ZipWP was co-founded by me and my friend and colleague, Adam Preiser. Between us, we have over 26 years of experience with WordPress and building websites.</p>



<p>I have helped create products that power over 5 million websites, including the Astra theme, Ultimate Addons plugins and many others.</p>



<p>Adam has spent many years teaching people how to use WordPress and create websites. His instructive videos have been viewed over 21 million times!</p>



<p>We have worked together for a while now and we’re having a blast!</p>



<p>But as much as we love WordPress, building with it can be a complex and time-consuming process.</p>



<p>It really shouldn’t be like that.</p>



<p>That’s what drove Adam and I to develop ZipWP.</p>



<p>We’re taking a revolutionary approach to website building. We’re combining the power of cutting-edge AI with the flexibility of WordPress.</p>



<p>So what does that mean for you?</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>It means saying goodbye to hours of grappling with themes, plugins, or code.</li>



<li>It means no more struggling to write compelling content that engages visitors.</li>



<li>It means being able to create a first draft website in minutes, not hours.</li>
</ul>



<p>ZipWP’s AI-powered platform can create a fully operational first draft website that’s almost ready to publish. It will include popular pages, images, placeholder content, a working contact page and maybe more.</p>



<p>All you’ll need to do is add your individual touch.</p>



<p>You don’t have to customize anything, but you can customize everything if you want to using simple drag-and-drop tools.</p>



<p>A website is more than just a digital presence. It’s an opportunity to showcase your uniqueness, creativity, and expertise to the world.</p>



<p>We want to be the catalyst that helps you achieve that. ✨</p>



<p>As we get closer to launching ZipWP, both Adam and I feel a mix of excitement and nervousness. We’ve poured our hearts and souls into this project, and we genuinely believe it has the potential to revolutionize website creation.</p>



<p>If you want to effortlessly build a website, express your creativity, or share your passion with the world, ZipWP is the platform you’ve been waiting for.</p>



<p>We can’t wait to welcome you to our family.</p>



<p>Let’s build a world where anyone can create a website that leaves a lasting impression. 🏆</p>



<p>Thank you for joining both of us on this incredible journey. We cannot wait to see what you create with ZipWP!</p>



<p>Let the new era of building amazing websites begin!</p>

<script type="rocketlazyloadscript" id="google-invisible-recaptcha-js-before">
var renderInvisibleReCaptcha = function() {

    for (var i = 0; i < document.forms.length; ++i) {
        var form = document.forms[i];
        var holder = form.querySelector('.inv-recaptcha-holder');

        if (null === holder) continue;
		holder.innerHTML = '';

         (function(frm){
			var cf7SubmitElm = frm.querySelector('.wpcf7-submit');
            var holderId = grecaptcha.render(holder,{
                'sitekey': '6Lfl1WIqAAAAAOkdNmKzr-R3P5FyVjv1NLHLXNWL', 'size': 'invisible', 'badge' : 'bottomright',
                'callback' : function (recaptchaToken) {
					if((null !== cf7SubmitElm) && (typeof jQuery != 'undefined')){jQuery(frm).submit();grecaptcha.reset(holderId);return;}
					 HTMLFormElement.prototype.submit.call(frm);
                },
                'expired-callback' : function(){grecaptcha.reset(holderId);}
            });

			if(null !== cf7SubmitElm && (typeof jQuery != 'undefined') ){
				jQuery(cf7SubmitElm).off('click').on('click', function(clickEvt){
					clickEvt.preventDefault();
					grecaptcha.execute(holderId);
				});
			}
			else
			{
				frm.onsubmit = function (evt){evt.preventDefault();grecaptcha.execute(holderId);};
			}


        })(form);
    }
};
</script>
